Uses of Class
com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.GuiControllerBuilder

  • Packages that use GuiControllerBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui  

    • Uses of GuiControllerBuilder in com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui

      Methods in com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui that return GuiControllerBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllersFactory.createGuiControllerBuilder(GuiCheckController checkController, DocumentSession documentSession) 
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllersFactory.createGuiControllerBuilder(GuiCheckController guiCheckController, DocumentSessionProvider documentSessionProvider) 
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllersFactory.createGuiControllerBuilder(GuiCheckController guiCheckController, DocumentSessionProvider documentSessionProvider, DocumentCheckSettingsStoreProvider documentCheckSettingsStore)
      Creates the GUI controller builder which is used for building a GuiController, depending on the functionality you want to provide.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withAbout(AboutCommandCallback aboutCommandCallback)
      Adds an about button to the toolbar and menu with the possibility to plug in your customized about dialog.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withAllCommands(AboutCommandCallback aboutCommandCallback, HelpCommandCallback helpCommandCallback)
      With all commands.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withCheckInline()
      Call this method if you want to have a check button on your toolbar or menu bar.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withCheckWithCorrectionDialog()
      With check with corrections dialog command.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withGuiUpdateListenerContext(GuiUpdateListenerContext guiUpdateListenerContext)
      If you have to deal with several GuiController you could use a GuiUpdateListenerContext, created by GuiFactory.guiUpdateListenersContexts(), to synchronize the updates.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withHelp(HelpCommandCallback helpCommandCallback)
      With help command.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withOptions()
      With options toolbar and menu command.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withoutCheckWithCorrectionDialog()
      Without check with corrections dialog command.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withRecheckSelection()
      With recheck selection command.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withShowOptionsStrategy(ShowOptionsStrategy showOptionsStrategy)
      Defines which strategy should be used for displaying the options dialog.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withShowReport()
      With show report command.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withShowResultStrategy(ShowResultStrategy showResultStrategy)
      Defines which strategy should be used for displaying the results dialog box.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withStepNext()
      With step next command.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withStepPrevious()
      With step previous command.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withToggleMarkings()
      With toggle markings command.
      GuiControllerBuilder GuiControllerBuilder.withToggleStepThroughMode()
      With toggle step-through mode command.
